entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Beaver Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:37 AM AST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Beaver Island 07:00 AM AST Friday 03 March 2023
Temperature: -3.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -4.4°C
Wind: N 54 km/h gust 65 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending this morning then clearing. Blowing snow this morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast early this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 03 March 2023
